title: Login Not Working
description: User cannot log into the platform with valid credentials.

title: Incorrect Billing Address
description: Customer's billing address shows a different city. They updated it but system didn't reflect changes.

title: Payment Gateway Error
description: Transaction fails with error code 503 while processing payments.

title: Forgot Password Not Working
description: Password reset email is not sent to the user.

title: UI Alignment Issue
description: Dashboard widgets are misaligned on smaller screens.

title: App Crash on Android
description: App crashes immediately on launch for Android version 14.

title: Search Not Showing Results
description: Search results are not displaying relevant products.

title: Slow Website Loading
description: Website takes more than 12 seconds to load homepage.

title: Broken Image Links
description: Product images are not showing on category pages.

title: CSV Export Not Working
description: Reports cannot be exported to CSV format.

title: 2FA Code Rejected
description: Two-factor authentication codes are not accepted even when correct.

title: Email Notifications Delayed
description: Order confirmation emails are delayed by 3â€“4 hours.
